p: Intra and in/ex ASVs ( Figure 3B) were frequently annotated as Proteobacteria in all DCls, except for DCl III. They mainly belonged to Acetobacteraceae (21 ASVs), Beijerinckiaceae (7 ASVs), and Burkholderiaceae (5 ASVs). Among intra ASVs, these taxa were frequent among all DCls ( Supplementary Figure 3), underlining their relevance in the decomposition of P. abies deadwood.
